div.div: Photoperiod treatment effects on body feather traits.
div.p: Panels show the effect of treatment on the density of barbules (A), total number of barbs (B), proportion of plumulaceous barbs (C), length (D) and area (E) of mantle feathers (mean ± SE). Photoperiod treatment groups: ‘CP’ control, ‘EP’ experimental. ‘ns’ non-significant, ‘*’ P≤0.05, ‘**’ P<0.01.
